alert.note: Alert for Gordon (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 06 at 5:24AM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Oostanaula River at Calhoun affecting Gordon County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Oostanaula River at Calhoun. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 21 feet, Minor flooding begins of woodlands...fields and pastures upstream and downstream from the gage behind a water treatment plant off Mauldin Road. A boat ramp and portions of a small parking lot on the upstream and right bank side of the Georgia Highway 136 Connector will be under water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM EST Friday the stage was 21.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:00 AM EST Friday was 21.3 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 21 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
